name: Zombies! (NaveenPrasadGames)
description:
Zombies is a Solo project created in Unity Engine and C#

Highlights:

  1. Weapons System - Multiple Weapons with different damage ratios, range, reload times and ammo
  2. Zombie AI
  3. Weapons can be purchased off walls and can be upgraded to increase damage, reload times and recoil
  4. Player Ranks to show experience killing zombies
  5. Shooting different objects shows different particle effects such as metal, rocks and water containers
  6. Can be played with Keyboard/Mouse or Gamepad
  7. Animation States for different weapons, enemies and player
  8. Hidden Easter Egg

Assets DO NOT belong to me and are used for educational purposes
